title: Election, heatwave impact bring down IndusInd Bankâ€™s Q1 disbursements
description: The bank grew its total loans by 15% on year to Rs 3.48 lakh crore. It grew only 1% sequentially as loan growth in the microfinance book fell by more than 5% while growth in credit cards was almost flat. Corporate loans were up 12.8% on year to Rs 1.57 lakh crore.
